name: SecuritySiren
0:
”Alexa, start security siren”
”Alexa, begin security siren”
”Alexa, launch security siren”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: security siren
des:
Could not find a good security siren in the exisitng Alexa Skills marketplace, so I built this one for my own house security purpose. Hope it is helpful to you as well.
It plays security siren and alert to scare off any intruders. The siren will be played immediately after Skill invoation keyword (i.e. "Security Siren") or Alexa Routine trigger, so with no any delay from Alexa initial interaction nor confirmation needed. 
Compatible with both Alexa Echo and Show devices.

To start, just say "Alexa, start Security Siren" or "Alexa, launch Security Siren".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
